name: ReBuilder (Moonlight_Studio2510)
description:
Please be sure to enter full screen for better experience.

This is ReBuilder a game where you have special ability to edit levels.  Using that ability will make levels easier to pass. Goal is to reach the flag. At the last level there is special prize - a trophy! Are you able to reach last level and get the trophy? Well, there is only one way to find out.

Controls:

A,D -  move

Space  -  jump

E - edit levels

Enter - finish editing levels

Mouse - used to move blocks

Credits:

Programmers:

Luka Velickovic

Dimitrije Blagojevic

Game Design:

Petar Mamlic

Game assets are for creator Pixel Frog.

Music and sounds are from MixKit.
